trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The krasis can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The krasis makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
